text: Lirabuccinum is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Species== Species within the genus Lirabuccinum listed by the World Register of Marine Species include: * Lirabuccinum dirum (Reeve, 1846) * Lirabuccinum fuscolabiatum (E. A. Smith, 1875) * Lirabuccinum hokkaidonis (Pilsbry, 1901) * Lirabuccinum musculus Callomon & Lawless, 2013 ==References== Category:Buccinidae
title: Lirabuccinum
